ygData.subject: L16 - where to buy voice graft
ygData.msgSnippet: Woo - made L16, stopped in at Neriak (I m a gnome, but figured they d be more complete than Freeport) and bought 8 of my spells.  I was told by someone that
ygData.messageBody:
Woo - made L16, stopped in at Neriak (I'm a gnome, but figured they'd be
more complete than Freeport) and bought 8 of my spells. I was told by
someone that Voice Graft is available in some cities, but it's either on a
vendor that won't talk to me (about 1/3 of them) or not there. Also
checked Freeport Necro/SK guild with no luck.

Can anyone provide a city that they know for certian carries this spell?
Vendor name and location would be great, but knowing it's in the city is
sufficient.

Also, for the research-only spells, what's the best way to get the
components? Do you just auction in every zone you enter? Is there
normally a strong presence of people selling words at the Bazaar (this is
Quellious, if it matters).
--
Mark Rafn dagon@... <http://www.dagon.net/> !G
